item.description:
I am rescheduling this ride for Sunday March 7th, it seems that Sunday will be the better of the 2 weekend days.

There are no other changes, at this time.

We will meet at South Bay Shopping Center, which is accessible from the southeast expressway and/or Mass. Ave. Plan to meet by the Bank of America, in area of parking that boarders Mass. Ave.
There are plenty of stores at South Bay Center including a gas station, super market ATM's, Target and Home Depot so if you forget something or need something you should be able to get it there.

Plan on leaving about 9:00 AM, we will head south on the expressway and then down Rt. 3 toward Cape Cod, cross the bridge and then take Rt. 6 into Provincetown.
We can stop along the way and plan on having lunch in Provincetown. There is no set agenda so.....
what ever we all agree on will be the plan.

The distance is about 115 miles each way and the weather should be in the mid 40's so dress accordingly, and bring your cameras.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking area that boarders Mass Ave. by Bank of America
item.name: Boston to Provincetown
